title: Walmart | SSE | Bangalore, India
content:
Education: BE in Tier 3 college
Years of Experience: 7.5
Prior Experience: Product Based 
Date of the Offer: 5th Jan 2024
Company: Walmart
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer (IN4)
Location: Bangalore, India
Current CTC - INR 33,00,00/- + ESOPs 
Base Salary: INR 41,00,000/-
Relocation: Standard Relocation Benefits
Stock bonus: 25% of Base Salary, INR 10,25,000/- (Vested over 3 years)
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year, INR 8,20,000/-
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock) for first year : ~ INR 52,61,667/-
Benefits: Standard walmart benefits
Other details: No joining bonus.
